name: Unflooder
description:
After an underground research facility is mysteriously flooded you have been tasked with draining the facility and finding out what went wrong. 

Using your trusty 6 megawatt vacuum hose drain different types of pixels out of rooms to reach the exits safely.

Features

  • Falling sand particle simulation, most pixels can kill you interact in interesting ways
  • 11 Levels containing various pixelated constructs
  • Hose physics

Exciting hazardous pixels include:

  •  Acid 
  •  Fire
  •  Oil
  •  Steam
  •  Corium
  •  Some others

I ran out of time before I could add any sound or music, I was too invested in a powder game platformer.

Made in 14 days for LOWREZJAM 2021

Press "R" if you need to reset
